biotools.summary: SpikePro algorithm predicts the fitness of a SARS-CoV-2 strain from the sequence of its spike protein. Given the target sequence in fasta format, the algorithm aligns it to the reference SARS-CoV-2 spike protein, list all mutations with respect to the reference and compute the fitness for each mutations as well as for the overal viral strain.
